problem_text: In Fig. 22-35, the four particles form a square of edge length $a=5.00 \mathrm{~cm}$ and have charges $q_1=+10.0 \mathrm{nC}, \quad q_2=-20.0 \mathrm{nC}, \quad q_3=$ $+20.0 \mathrm{nC}$, and $q_4=-10.0 \mathrm{nC}$. In unitvector notation, what net electric field do the particles produce at the square's center?
